content.p: Organisation and People Development has the following mission: For staff – To provide a range of training and development services to help develop the necessary skills, knowledge and professional expertise required to successfully deliver School or Unit objectives and contribute to the University Plan. For PG students – To provide a range of training and development services to help develop the necessary skills and knowledge to assist them to become successful teaching assistants and learn a wider set of personal and professional skills relevant to future employment. The principles and working culture statement identifies the behaviour and values required by Organisation and People Develpment staff to achieve the strategic aims. The OPD team will: B12 Kings' Meadow Campus Lenton Lane Nottingham, NG7 2NR telephone: +44 (0) 115 74 84800 email: pd@nottingham.ac.uk
